about_the_game:
"UpBreakers" is an absolute must for casual gaming lovers. As a perfect party game, it is a great alternative to popular games like Overcooked and the predecessor to Moving Out. This chaotic multiplayer indie game is specially designed for quick play sessions as an exciting couch multiplayer. Dive into a furniture moving game that impresses with its breakable environment mechanics. Whether you are looking for competitive casual games or local co-op, "UpBreakers" will not disappoint. With simple controls and a colorful indie aesthetic, it's the perfect game for casual gamers looking for the next big laugh.



Do you know the feeling when a dream couple suddenly turns into two angry singles? That's exactly your setting in UpBreakers. You are part of a moving team that has split into two competing companies. The goal? Grab, haul, and sometimes throw more furniture out the window than the other team!

The beauty of "UpBreakers" is that it's perfect for those who want to play in short, chaotic and absolutely fun sessions with 2-16 friends. Whether you only have a few minutes or a whole hour, this game offers quick fun and delightfully crazy moments that you won't soon forget.



So, indie fans, invite your friends, throw on an "UpBreakers" session and enjoy the crazy, chaotic and incredibly fun moments that only such a diamond in the rough can provide!

name: UpBreakers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: One gamepad per player
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews:
“UpBreakers is a fun arcade brawler indie game perfect for an intense couch session with friends (local coop or multi), collect more items, dash, grab, throw stuff at your rivals, nice!”
EARTH IN THE PORTHOLE
short_description: The ultimate indie casual game! Two feuding movers, one chaotic goal: haul and throw more furniture than the opposing team. Fast-paced multiplayer fun, perfect for short, crazy sessions with friends. Laugh, play, tear down walls! 🛋️🎮🤣
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
